Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Repeals provisions related to high income rent deregulation; repealer
Summary: Repeals provisions related to high income rent deregulation.
LawCode: Rpld §5 sub a ¶12, §5-a, Emerg Ten Prot Act of 1974; rpld §26-504.3, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal paragraph 12 of subdivision a of section 5 of the emergency tenant protection act of nineteen seventy-four, relating to high income rent deregulation; to repeal section 5-a of the emergency tenant protection act of nineteen seventy-four, relating to high income rent deregulation; and to repeal section 26-504.3 of the administrative code of the city of New York, relating to high income rent deregulation
